metadata.title: CVE-2017-17513 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: TeX Live through 20170524 does not validate strings before launching theprogram specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allowremote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL,related to linked_scripts/context/stubs/unix/mtxrun,texmf-dist/scripts/context/stubs/mswin/mtxrun.lua, andtexmf-dist/tex/luatex/lualibs/lualibs-os.lua.

criterions.comment: texlive-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
context: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
texlive-bin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
